reuters.title: AMERICAN TRAVELLERS <ATVC> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
reuters.body: American Travellers Corp said it has entered into an agreement to purchase ISL Life Insurance Co of Dallas, a corporate shell with active licenses to operate in 12 states, for about 400,000 dlrs. The company said closing is expected by late spring and will result in American Travellers being licensed in seven new states. Reuter 
